parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240015), which is a strong indicator of electoral propaganda, as it's a mandatory identifier for campaign materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Elena Lasconi" and promotes her candidacy for President.  While the image shows two USR candidates, the text focuses on Elena Lasconi and her position on the ballot. This directly refers to a candidate participating in the elections, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this message is clearly intended for a wide audience, not just personal communication. Facebook's public nature ensures broad reach, satisfying "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to choose Elena Lasconi, explicitly stating "Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi!". This directly aims to influence the election outcome, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's a clear endorsement, not an informative piece. It doesn't present different viewpoints or provide balanced information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>This is not a personal opinion; it's a direct call to action promoting a specific candidate.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>875948338037913</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Elena Lasconi), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support her. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's content is promotional, not journalistic.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>Elena Lasconi</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
USR Maramureș, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul postării 875948338037913, care promovează candidatul Elena Lasconi la președinție, îndemnând la vot cu fraza "Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi!", având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea acesteia, fapt demonstrat prin prezența CMF-ului 11240015 și conținutul explicit al postării.  Reclama, prin natura sa promoțională și lipsa obiectivității jurnalistice, constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
